title: Strategies for Promoting Student Engagement in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic usage of online learning environments
context.additional_context: Non-degree courses involving professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, utilizing flexible learning environments with personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can design behavioral strategies (e.g., time management, regular participation) in an online environment.
Learners can propose three or more instructor-learner interaction strategies for designing learning experiences.
Learners can implement two or more solutions to address technical factors (e.g., platform accessibility, device compatibility).
Learners can develop a learning plan that incorporates psychological engagement factors (e.g., motivation, feedback utilization).
Learners can establish a collaborative system with peer learners for project-based assessments.

resources: Microsoft Forms or Google Forms Survey Tools

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
